segments.text: Do you know how to go to the Fragrant Hills in Beijing ? I heard that they are very famous in China .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Especially in autumn , the red leaves of the maple trees make the whole mountain red .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it can make people feel as if they were in the land of fairies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Have you ever been there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you go there with me ? I'd like someone who is familiar with that area to go with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I'd be very glad to be your tour guide .
segments.speaker: S2
